text: Ara amara tadera antara theke irsa dura karaba [1], tadera padadese prabahita habe nadisamuha. Ara tara balabe, ‘yabatiya prasansa allahara'i yini amaderake e pathera hidayata karechena. Allaha amaderake hidayata na karale, amara kakhano hidayata petama na. Abasya'i amadera rabera rasulagana satya niye esechilena.’ Ara taderake sambodhana kare bala habe, "tomara ya karate tara'i jan'ya tomaderake e jannatera [2] oyarisa kara hayeche.’
